subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Officially, Michael Strahan and Lawrence Taylor each have 132½ sacks. But the N.F.L. did not recognize sacks as a statistic until 1982 and Taylor had 9½ sacks as a rookie in 1981.
snippet: Officially, Michael Strahan and Lawrence Taylor each have 132½ sacks. But the N.F.L. did not recognize sacks as a statistic until 1982 and Taylor had 9½ sacks as a rookie in 1981.
